extendedInfo.description: The only conference of its kind geared to CFOs and other financial executives of not-for-profit organizations, the AICPA Not-For Profit Financial Executive Forum is a solutions-based conference featuring top experts, and designed specifically to define the issues and provide the answers for your financial, technical and structural operations. Learn about the power of cloud-based technologies and how they can enhance your efficiency, how tools such as rolling forecasts can help in developing sound strategies for planning and operational management, and why Lean Six Sigma, a well-known tool for achieving operational excellence, is now making its way into the non-profit sector. Youâll take valuable insights and tools back to your organization that can be implemented immediately. Keywords: AICPA, CPA2Biz, CFOs, financial executives, cloud-based technologies, planning, operational management
